suggested_yarn: Any gauge - designed for any gauge ?
full_text: Available in English, German, French, Hungarian and PHP. ;-) Available in German, English, French, Hungarian and PHP. ;-) Raglano is a classic nobody-should-be-without – a seamless raglan sweater that is knitted top down. Knit Raglano as an airy summer top or cozy turtleneck sweater to keep you warm in winter, with short or long sleeves, bright or subtle colors, with or without stripes, ribbing, textured stitch patterns – with this basic pattern, anything is possible. Raglano is precisely what my »MAXIMUM FREEDOM« patterns are about. Free yourself from required gauge! Take your favorite yarn and knit it as tightly or loosely as you want. I take you step by step through clear instructions, simple formulas and useful tips. A classic that should not be missing in any wardrobe! A sweater with raglan sleeves that is knitted seamlessly from top to bottom. Whether as an airy shirt for the summer or as a thick turtleneck sweater for the winter. With short or long sleeves, in bright colors or subtle, with stripes, ribs or patterns. With these basic instructions everything is possible. With Raglano you get an impression of what exactly “MAXIMUM FREEDOM” means to me. Free yourself from prescribed stitch samples! Take your favorite yarn and knit it as loosely or as tightly as you like. I'll take you by the hand step by step with clear instructions, simple formulas and useful tips. Raglano is LE chandail classique que nous devrions tous et toutes avoir dans our garde-robe: a chandail à Manche raglan, sans couture et qui se travaille de haut en bas. Raglano can be worn in a comfortable, comfortable winter with a mountain view. On this faire with the many longues or courts, the brilliant colors or the subtle tones, with or without rays, with the torsades or the points textures: with the patron de base, all is possible. Raglano is the example parfait de ce que mes patrons «LIBERTÉ AU MAXIMUM» veulent être. Libérez-vous de l’obligation d’avoir la good tension dans votre échantillon. Prenez votre laine préférée et tricotez-la extra souplement or also serré que vous le désirez. Je vous accompagne pas-à-pas with the indications claires, the simple formulas and the astuces utiles.
